_comment: ==Aza'raan Project== | @name: Aza'raan Font Google Apps Override | @namespace: https://github.com/thetransgendertrex/Azaraanlanguage | @version: 1.5 | @description: Chrome Extension version that applies the Aza'raan font override for Google Apps ONLY (Docs, Slides, Sheets, Forms, Drive, Drawings). | @author: William Blake Saville
name: Aza'raan Font Google Apps Override
description: Override Pacifico with Aza'raan on Google Apps ONLY (Docs, Slides, Sheets, etc.). Aza'raan fully usable font in Google apps dropdown and typing.
